t&c.createAccountTitle1: By creating an account on Control Central you will be able to:
t&c.createAccountExplanation1: Access the Central Control dashboard and Incidents
t&c.createAccountExplanation2: Connect your account to the production execution process (bot updates, passwords, client management, etc.)
t&c.createAccountExplanation3: Having internal access to CC services and apps (Formless, Lite Plans, Executions...)
t&c.createAccountClarification1: Some access levels vary depending on the role and area
t&c.createAccountClarification2: Once created, the account must be activated by the administrator: ask your superior to activate your account.
t&c.createAccountClarification3: Request the login code for your area from your supervisor.
t&c.createAccountClarification4: To get a developer account, contact the administrator. If you already have a developer account, select the developer app in the upper right corner of this website.
t&c.agreementTitle1: By creating your account on Control Central you agree to the following:
t&c.agreementTopic1: You will not share your login credentials (no one, not even the administrator, should know your password)
t&c.agreementTopic2: You will use an email address provided by the company
t&c.agreementTopic3: The system will record the actions you perform on Central Control
t&c.agreementTopic4: You will use two-factor authentication (an app is required to authenticate)
